content: असंबाध {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not narrow, spacious, wide. {@--2@} Not crowded with people, lonely, solitary. {@--3@} Open, accessible; <ls>Ki. 3. 53.</ls> {@--4@} Separated by an interval; द्विपैरसंबाधमयांबभूवे <ls>Śi. 3. 67.</ls> {@--5@} Without pain. --धा <ab>N.</ab> of a metre consisting of 56 syllables. --धं <ab>Ved.</ab> Open space.
